statements: DELETE FROM data_pipeline WHERE id = 1 AND event_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM data_pipeline WHERE event_time < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM model_updates WHERE model_id = 2 AND update_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM data_pipeline dp JOIN model_updates mu ON dp.id = mu.model_id WHERE dp.event_type = 'click' AND mu.update_timestamp > dp.event_timestamp;
DELETE FROM real_time_data WHERE id = 1 AND event_name = 'event_1';
DELETE FROM model_updates WHERE update_id IN (SELECT update_id FROM model_updates WHERE model_name = 'model_1' AND update_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY);
DELETE FROM DataPipeline WHERE id = 123 AND pipeline_name = 'example_pipeline';
DELETE FROM RealTimeDataIngestion WHERE data_source = 'AWS Kinesis' AND ingestion_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ModelUpdates WHERE model_name = 'example_model' AND last_updated < '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM model_updates WHERE model_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM data_source WHERE id IN (SELECT data_source_id FROM model_metadata WHERE model_name = 'example_model');
